scripts.build: node ../../scripts/getGitVersion.mjs && tsc && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=102400 buildType=SQLE,PROVISION vite build
scripts.build:ce:sqle: node ../../scripts/getGitVersion.mjs && tsc && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=102400 buildType=ce,SQLE vite build
scripts.build:ee:sqle: node ../../scripts/getGitVersion.mjs && tsc && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=102400 buildType=SQLE vite build
scripts.build:demo:sqle: node ../../scripts/getGitVersion.mjs && tsc && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=102400 buildType=ce,SQLE,DEMO vite build
scripts.build:provision: node ../../scripts/getGitVersion.mjs && tsc && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=102400 buildType=PROVISION vite build
